abstract: Heavy equipment maker Caterpillar said its railroad service unit will spend $820 million cash to acquire locomotive maker Electro-Motive Diesel, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Heavy equipment maker Caterpillar said its railroad service unit will spend $820 million cash to acquire locomotive maker Electro-Motive Diesel, The Associated Press reported.
